pkgmetadata.longdescription: PyJKS enables Python projects to load and manipulate Java KeyStore(JKS) data without a JVM dependency. PyJKS supports JKS, JCEKS, BKSand UBER (BouncyCastle) keystores. Simply:: pip install pyjksOr:: easy_install pyjksThen:: import jks keystore = jks.KeyStore.load('keystore.jks', 'passphrase') print(keystore.private_keys) print(keystore.certs) print(keystore.secret_keys)And that's barely scratching the surface. Check out `the usage examples onGitHub <https://github.com/kurtbrose/pyjks#usage-examples>`_ formore!
